channel.title: Npc dialogue HELP
channel.description:
I need to know how to add the the NPC dialogue that i can talk to like and when you talk to him he will say like: "thanks for playing!" "enjoy you're stay at our server!" (just need the code)
What person I want: Caleb NPC ID: 666
I can't talk to him on the server so if i add the code will it work? thanks for trying to help me!
